item.title: 显示HN：用语音和手势控制3D模型
item.description:
I'm sharing my project to control 3D models with voice commands and hand gestures:- use voice commands to change interaction mode (drag, rotate, scale, animate)- use hand gestures to control the 3D model- drag/drop to import other models (only GLTF format supported for now)Created using threejs, mediapipe, web speech API, rosebud AI, and Quaternius 3D型号 githhub repo： https://github.com/collidingscopes/3d-modelscopes/3d-model-playground 我喜欢您的反馈！谢谢
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444170694 点：8 ＃评论：0
